name: Leonard 'Leo' Beckett
dialogue_tone: A booming, commanding voice with the ability to fluently switch between technical jargon and enthusiastic chatter about personal passions. Accompanied by a hearty, contagious laugh, especially when discussing or enjoying favorite foods.

personality_traits.description: Often consumed in own world of math and mechanics, displaying a sharp, analytical mind.
Has little patience for mediocrity, always striving for excellence in every endeavor.
Fear of commitment results in frequent job and relationship changes, always seeking something new.
Great love for food, frequently indulging without concern for its origin.
Can appear snobbish due to high standards and little patience for mediocrity.

living_conditions: Working at a famous tech firm
Frequent job changes due to noncommittal nature
Constant search for change in life and work
